sentences.english: Roofless towers appeared and disappeared, thrusting blindly upward.
sentences.chinese: 无顶的塔不断显现又隐匿，盲目的直插云霄。

sentences.english: Enterprise's outside migration is one of the results of industry structure adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 企业外迁是经济发展过程中产业结构调整的微观显现。

sentences.english: Third, the adverse consequences of overheated investment in some industries are becoming apparent.
sentences.chinese: 三是部分行业过度投资的不良后果开始显现。

sentences.english: The manifestations of our metaphysical wisdom mirror can originate in three ways.
sentences.chinese: 我们的形上镜智显现能从三种方式出现。

sentences.english: It was a seemingly irrelevant detail, whose import is suddenly clear.
sentences.chinese: 这看似是不相关的细节，但它的重要突然显现出来。

sentences.english: US defence spending is levelling off and appears to be on the brink of a potentially significant downturn.
sentences.chinese: 美国国防预算正在下降并显现出处在重大衰退的边缘。

sentences.english: However, Husserl's real fact is what appears to consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 胡塞尔的实事则是向意识显现出来的一切。

sentences.english: Who can stand when he appears?
sentences.chinese: 他显现的时候，谁能立得住呢？

sentences.english: She who sends energy to the matrix that perpetuates the reality in which souls may manifest.
sentences.chinese: 向矩阵传送能量的她使灵魂可以显现的实相永存。

sentences.english: The symptoms of sunburn do not begin until two to four hours after the sun's damage has been done.
sentences.chinese: 晒斑的症状在阳光损害后两到四小时才会显现。

sentences.english: By early 2008, the system began showing signs of weakness.
sentences.chinese: 到了2008年初，该系统开始显现出脆弱的信号。

sentences.english: When you get older， crow‘s feet often form around your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 你年纪大的时候，鱼尾纹常常会在你的眼周显现。

sentences.english: Third, regional differences are also shown in the various income elasticities .
sentences.chinese: 再者，省市间差異亦显现在所得弹性上。

sentences.english: And the macro-control measures need time to take effect.
sentences.chinese: 政府宏观调控的作用一段时间之后才能显现出来。

sentences.english: Fixed a problem that prevented Watcher Wards from being revealed by the Dust of Appearance.
sentences.chinese: 修正了哨岗守卫不被显形之尘显现的问题。

sentences.english: After his death,Jesus appeared to his disciples in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣死后，在耶路撒冷向门徒显现。

definition: to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to emerge in large numbers/to spring up/to emerge prominently
